Altilia Resource Center

07 Jun 2022 - 1 minute to read
Altilia Resource Center's purpose is to guide and help users who are new to Altilia Intelligent Automation™ and need our support, or are experiencing an issue, otherwise to request a new feature.
    1. In any module you can click on question icon to access on the Resource Center

Submit a Bug

    1. In the Resource Center panel, at right of the screen, request our support by clicking on “Submit a Bug”:
    1. The form to request our support opens on a new page. Fill it with all details to speed up the resolution.
    1. This is the entry point for you to make a request to our Altilia Team in case you need support understanding anything about our platform or if you are experiencing a bug on it. The following are the fields that you can specify (*mandatory fields):
      • Summary*: title/object of the request
      • Description*: description of the request.
      • Impacted Module: modules impacted on the platform (Project, Knowledge Bases, Datasets, Connectors, Flows, Sources, or Skills)
      • “Is it blocking for your work?” is checked if the user's work is impacted
      • Urgency: priority level for the user
      • Attachment: to help understand the request
      • Reporter Name* and Reporter e-mail* to reply the user.
      • Also a security reCAPTCHA check must be selected before submitting the request.
    2. Hit the “Submit” button, at this point a pop-up message informs you that the request has been reached on our side, we will reply as soon as possible!

Request a Feature

    1. In the Resource Center panel, at right of the screen, request a feature to be added on our platform by clicking on “Request a Features”:
    1. The form to request a feature opens on a new page. Fill it with all details and thanks for your input, we promise to make good use of it!
    1. This is the entry point for you to make a request to our Altilia Team to add a new features. The following are the fields that you can specify (*mandatory fields):
      • Summary*: title/object of the request
      • Description*: description of the request.
      • Attachment: to help understand the request
      • Reporter Name* and Reporter e-mail* to reply the user.
      • Also a security reCAPTCHA check must be selected before submitting the request.
    2. Hit the “Submit” button, at this point a pop-up message informs you that the request has been reached on our side, we will reply as soon as possible!
